messages.title: 5 MORE YEARS OF GORDON BROWN OR CHANGE WITH
messages.content: Vote for change with Hazel Noonan in Coventry North East

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cut red tape to encourage local businesses
Upgrade pension payments, keep winter fuel allowance, protect free bus passes
Improve street lighting, visible community policing
More doctor's surgeries, increase hospital cleanliness

issues.economy: Cut red tape to encourage local businesses, create jobs
issues.health: More doctor's surgeries, increase hospital cleanliness
issues.socialWelfare: Upgrade pension payments, keep winter fuel allowance, protect free bus passes

leaflet.personalStatement: Hazel has always lived in Coventry, with experiences of owning a small business and raising a family to best understand the challenges and highlight the potential in our daily lives.
